text: Hop or hops can mean several things: * Hop, a kind of small jump, usually using only one leg, but can also be on two * Humulus, a genus of flowering plants ** Hops, the female flower clusters of a species of hop * Hop, informal word for opium, a type of drug * Hop (networking), next gateway along a path to a destination host * Hop (movie), a movie from 2011 * Hop! Channel, an channel from Israel == Related pages == * Hip hop
title: Hop
